entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 2:23 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:23 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 2:23 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
